name: PujaKaro
desc: MERN stack project with Firebase database integration. It features Google authentication, booking services, and an admin dashboard for streamlined management.

desc: A mobile application built with Expo and React Native, integrating with the Bajaj API to deliver fastag functionalities. The project focuses on performance and seamless API connectivity.

desc: A responsive real estate platform built as a freelance project for seamless property transactions, deployed on Hostinger.
